snippet: The Knicks said that the status of Amar’e Stoudemire, who seriously cut his hand after Game 2, would probably be a game-time decision Sunday.
abstract: New York Knicks are preparing for Game 4 of their first-round playoff series against Miami Heat, who have a 3-0 series lead; Knicks forward Amar'e Stoudemire is questionable after injuring his hand.
lead_paragraph: The Knicks said that the status of Amar’e Stoudemire, who seriously cut his hand after Game 2, would probably be a game-time decision Sunday.

headline.seo: N.B.A. Playoffs: Stoudemire a Maybe for the Knicks
headline.main: End Is Likely for Knicks; Stoudemire Is a Maybe
headline.print_headline: End Is Likely for Knicks; Stoudemire Is a Maybe
